talksYaml.title: Deploy a Python API to the Cloud, Fast!
talksYaml.description: APIs are great and fun to develop, but how can you deploy and host one? This talk will cover designing and deploying a simple Python REST API to AWS using AWS Lambda and AWS API Gateway, using the AWS Serverless Application Model as infrastructure as code to define the API specs and deploy all of the code. All with ZERO server interactions!
